alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 9:13PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lamoille, northeastern Chittenden and southwestern Franklin Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 913 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Milton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Burlington, South Burlington, Waterville, Underhill, Jericho, Cambridge, Winooski, Cambridge Village, Essex, Westford, Jericho Village, Jeffersonville Village, Essex Junction Village, Underhill State Park, Fairfax, Fletcher, Milton, Bakersfield and Georgia. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 91 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
